nodes.text: Peirs was a planet within the Peirs system of the Outer Rim Territories' Kathol sector. Connected to the neighboring planets of Gandle Ott, Shintel and Ivatch by hyperlanes, Peirs supported a small colony whose economy was based around supplying ore and natural resources to Gandle Ott.

Peirs was featured in The DarkStryder Campaign, a supplement for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game by West End Games. Peirs was not featured directly in any adventure, but was included to give background information on worlds within the Kathol sector. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Peirs system, and therefore the planet Peirs, in grid square M-21.
